channel.title: Attituning Weekly on Paris Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Attituning Weekly on Paris Personal Blog

item.title: Fail Faster and Better
item.description: When was the last time you failed at something. Or have you settled into the safe and steady zone.

item.title: Do you know when to STOP?
item.description: I was listening to a sermon by Pastor Keith Battle over at Zion Church.

item.title: A storm is coming. Are you ready?
item.description: Have you ever felt like something is coming. Something big. It makes you feel nervous and excited at the same time.

item.title: Is Love a verb, noun or adjective?
item.description: Is Love a Verb, a Noun or an Adjective. Since Valentineâ€™s day just past I thought it was worth reflecting on what love is. Here are my sources of wisdom.

item.title: Clearing the rubble
item.description: A house is built on a foundation This foundation is developed into floors. It becomes a place for living and creating memories.

item.title: What does it mean to let go?
item.description: The topic of letting go has come up multiple times this week. Several friends have told me that this year was a good year for learning how to let go more.

item.title: How to build a habit in the next five days
item.description: Building habits does not have to be difficult. You can read about the science of habits or the power of habits all you want.

item.title: HALF ACCEPTING AND HALF *SSING
item.description: Welcome to the first issue of Attituning Weekly - a newsletter for people interested in personal development and location independent entrepreneurship.
